actions.text: On agreeing to the Hoyer amendment (A030) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment provides $7 million to the Centers for Disease Control to address the issue of human health effects from exposure to Pfiesteria.
purpose: An amendment to reduce funds appropriated in the bill for Employment and Traning Administration within the Department of Labor by $7 million, and increase funds for the Center for Deasease Control and Prevention for Disease Control, Research, and Training commensurately.
